Reviews.Title: “Not the best, Nor the Worst!”
Reviews.Author: Ksmith91
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 friends booked 5person dorm perfect dreaded splitting 2 clean basic little home 5 20 guys week trip amsterdam finding hotel little hard days walk hotel city via van gough museum museum district pleasure chore means hotel hilton marriot cheap share similar philosophy cleanliness friendly staff hotels lack consider hotel imagine 5 lads gone amsterdam reasons historical scenery team staff realised quickly told local coffee shops bars evenings missed curfew midnight staff happy hours fun loves rest green hours defiantly worth look

Reviews.Title: “a good place for staying during the week”
Reviews.Author: gino507
Reviews.Content: hostel according price cheap cant wait 5 stars money clean bed confortable team friendly price weekends litle normally cost 10 euros pass time 15 minutes walking restaurants

Reviews.Title: “excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: sam q
Reviews.Content: disregard pretentious reviews posted hostel firstly hostel backpackers persons looking affordable stay amsterdam expensive city hostel easilly tram bus taxi ride dam square costs 25euros tram journey centre amsterdam passes rembrantplein popular destinations tourists providing explore shop enjoy vibrant hostel clean decent facilities staff friendly helpful queries directions useful remember hostel 5 star hotel accustomed staying hostels accomodation suitable accomodate try breakfast staff happy bring food drink hostel consume communal provides microwave toaster kettle definatley reccommend hostel looking pleasent affordable stay amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Terrible hostel run by thieves”
Reviews.Author: victoria c
Reviews.Content: booked hostel online 3 nights paid 4 bed 3 girls arrived pay cash informed sent random hostel street arrived hostel walked switched 4 person 12 person bedroom filled scary sketchy looking horrified immediately downstairs fix situation acknowledged booked 4 person merely didnt basically changed reservation screwed told comfortable staying money night reserved paid refused refund money acted deal told stay dorm creepy leave left hostel middle night rain try figure stay night told return morning talk manager situation day front desk claimed wasnt manager found manager lied avoid dealing situation rude kept screaming getting money insulting yelling money claimed fault cancel entire stay didnt spoke hostel originally sent wouldnt responsibility refund money stole money cash spend single minute aside dirty sketchy terrible wifi horrible rude rude rude thieves running speak english dutch allowed run hostel nightmare dont unless robbed disrespected

Reviews.Title: “good for wild beasts”

Reviews.Content: girls perfect home youre able positive review ive amsterdam friends mine soo bad ok maybe makes snugly ok technical due renovations girls ok ive bee lot conditions worse fe bali rats bedbugs bedsheet coverlet clean staff nice sympathetic breakfast 10am assigned period perfect short stay amsterdam male friends wilde beasts rule

Reviews.Title: “My nightmare at Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: phamleminh
Reviews.Content: huge mistake booked 2 nights hostel trip amsterdam enjoyable actually booked price accept low quality bed bad location stuffs ok dont care sleep extremely surprised dorm dirty havent cleaned dorm centuries terrible toilet lock means enter toilet bathroom using door toilet broken funniest stuffs reception guy direction museumplein tram bus instruction map location wanna guess wifi bring laptop tiny lobby internet joke recommendation avoid hell hostel

Reviews.Content: stay hotel dirty city center 4 beds bed linen clean elses hair dont wash someones pubic hair wc breakfast poor didnt eat hotel barely hostel terrible experience couldnt sleep
